title: report azir E have no  knock up he is gank   victim pico .
body:
report azir E have no  knock up he is gank  
victim pico .

Azir is too weak no knock up her e is usless.
Azir e is only use for escape now.

replies.body: Azir need knock up to enage ... her e only escape now.

> [{quoted}](name=Rpgboss,realm=EUW,application-id=ImBE6GqA,discussion-id=he79KfUE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-22T16:21:56.888+0000)
>
> Azir need knock up to enage ... her e only escape now.

Then don't engage.
Hes an ap-adc. Do you know an adc, who can engage and got mobility?
Do you know another apc with his mobility, burst, utility and dps?
Azir doesn't need to engage.

azire need knock up ... 
vs kata esay if azir have no ult now kata jump ult  azir dead .. 
cant stop tp only with ult now  .
cant stop enemy who chease you mate only with ult now.

> [{quoted}](name=Rpgboss,realm=EUW,application-id=ImBE6GqA,discussion-id=he79KfUE,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-07-22T17:34:13.320+0000)
>
> azire need knock up ... 
> vs kata esay if azir have no ult now kata jump ult  azir dead .. 
> cant stop tp only with ult now  .
> cant stop enemy who chease you mate only with ult now.

Wait lets think about Lux, about Orianna, about.....
Are they better vs Kata? No. And they even cant run away because they have no jump...
Azir got a great utility. He is not a laner or 1on1 champ and in a teamfight there should be more crowd control then Azir's ultimate.
So no need for the knock up on an escape ability.

Then the ability should be changed. Why even need a shield if connects with an enemy champ? I reckon they should change it so he darts to a target location (the mouse) and leaves a soldier where he was standing. No longer a 2 move escape and give some interesting new dynamics.

Azir just got a 20% as buff on his W. This really does compensate his weaker early. The problem about a good Azir was, that he had no weak phase during the game + that his lategame was wayyy to strong for his early range+poke+mana value+survivabitly+cc. Previous he was able to poke and kill an enemy on lane as a hardcore lategame champ. Now you finally need to care a bit (still not enough imo) about your positioning while farming.
